sentences.sContent: Tasmania - The island state is one of the world's major suppliers of licit opiate products.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tasmania - The island state is one of the world's major suppliers of licit opiate products.
sentences.sCn: 塔斯马尼亚--岛屿之洲。 塔斯马尼亚洲是世界上合法鸦片剂产品的主要产地。

sentences.sContent: Afghanistan has not one but three economies: the aid economy, the largest one; a second illicit economy centered on drugs and smuggling; and a tiny licit economy, both formal and informal.
sentences.sContent_eng: Afghanistan has not one but three economies: the aid economy, the largest one; a second illicit economy centered on drugs and smuggling; and a tiny licit economy, both formal and informal.
sentences.sCn: 阿富汗不仅仅有一个而是有三个经济来源：援助经济是最主要的一个;第二个是非法经济集中在毒品和走私活动，第三个则是包括正式的和非正式的小型合法经济。
